title: Mentoring-Based Microlearning to Understand Taiwanese Engineers' Workplace Socialization Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental technical expertise and organizational culture comprehension
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning. Strengthens practical application skills through project-based evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can explain Confucian cultural characteristics (guanxi, hierarchical relationships) and the socialization process of engineers in Taiwanese workplace environments
Learners can plan and implement technical/social adaptation strategies using mentoring techniques
Learners can analyze Taiwanese engineer case studies and propose localization strategies through project-based assessment tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
